DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study explore symptom distress , fatigue , depression , uncertainty , quality life heart transplant recipient , associate factor quality life ( QOL ) . The eligible patient ( 1 ) undergone heart transplantation recruit Department Cardiac Surgery , Nation Taiwan University Hospital , ( 2 ) 18 year old older . A set questionnaire Transplant Symptom Frequency Symptom Distress Scale , Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ) , Fatigue Symptom Inventory ( FSI ) , Mishel 's Uncertainty Scale , 12-item Short-Form Health Survey ( SF-12 ) use collect symptom distress , fatigue , depression , uncertainty , QOL .
